meta.title: Slotty - Availability Calendar for Freelancers
meta.description: Stop chasing clients. Let them book you. Share your availability calendar, receive booking requests, approve with one click.

hero.subheadline: Share your availability calendar, receive booking requests, and approve with one click. Built for freelancers who value their time.

features.subheadline: Built specifically for freelancers, photographers, consultants, and anyone who manages their own schedule.

calendar.title: Public Calendar
calendar.desc: Share a beautiful, branded calendar with your clients. They see your real-time availability without back-and-forth emails.

booking.title: Booking Requests
booking.desc: Clients request dates, you approve or decline. Stay in control of your schedule while making it easy for clients to book.

multiday.title: Multi-Day Bookings
multiday.desc: Accept date ranges for longer projects, events, or multi-day shoots. Perfect for photographers and event planners.

branding.title: Custom Branding
branding.desc: Add your logo, customize colors, and make the calendar your own. Present a professional image to every client.

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.desc: Get notified instantly when someone requests a booking. Never miss an opportunity again.

doubleBooking.title: No Double-Booking
doubleBooking.desc: Smart availability management ensures you never accidentally double-book. Your calendar stays accurate and reliable.

how.subheadline: From sign-up to your first booking in under 5 minutes. No complicated setup required.

step1.title: Create Your Calendar
step1.desc: Sign up and set up your availability calendar in seconds. Add your branding and customize the look.

step2.title: Share Your Link
step2.desc: Get a unique public link to your calendar. Share it on your website, social media, or send directly to clients.

step3.title: Get Booked
step3.desc: Clients request dates, you approve with one click. Your calendar updates automatically. That's it!

comparison.subheadline: See how Slotty transforms the way you manage bookings.

pricing.subheadline: Start free, upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

cta.subheadline: Join hundreds of freelancers who have simplified their booking process. Start for free, no credit card required.

footer.tagline: The simplest way for freelancers to manage their availability and get booked by clients.
